property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Choose a number for X. Deplete X characters you control. Pick a character.
EFFECT: If the the picked character has X+X strength or less, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: very well sir, human head stuffed with tacos If even one thing is wrong, even the slightest thing, a bad phrase, spilt salt, weak posture, anything at all...the consequences can be horrific. Exploded, melted, turned inside out, consumed by fire, filled with pudding...the 12 Man Brunch has finished many a cocksure arcanist. - Werner Geisen, Master Ritualist

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: This turn, the character gains Covert. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: to the air!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck if you can. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Zi Jian Get a leg up on the pile. No probalo!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If an attacking or blocking party is formed, it must have an even number of members.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: where suspicion breeds confidence �"Take two lefts, an up, and a sideways�it's the third door on your right.�

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Play this only if you have at least 5 cards in your deck. Deplete up to 5 characters you control. X is the number of characters you deplete this way.
EFFECT: Search your deck for 5 cards and reveal them. Your opponent chooses X of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest into your discard pile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: on the cutting edge of compulsion

property.name: Card Text
property.value: FORESIGHT COST: Deplete this card. EFFECT: Look at up to the top 5 cards of either deck. Put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: a comprehensive course in absurdity Smarch 5th � Strong voidal storms from the southeast. Wear a bowler hat.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Ashes of Zenobia
At the start of your turn, draw a card.
NULLIFY COST: Pay 5. EFFECT: Both players put a character they control into its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: used to be �Pot Roast of Zenobia� Until Zenobia left the damn stove on. Again.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While you have an even number of cards in your hand, this card gains 1 strength, 1 life, and 1 speed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: let me get that�please�please� �It appears that after the victim was murdered, the suspect cleaned the room, did the dishes, and organized his books alphabetically.�

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Your opponent cannot respond to this card.
Your opponent discards a card. You may play a non-resource card with numeric cost X or less for free, where X is the numeric cost of the discarded card. (You still need to meet its threshold and satisfy its extra costs.) Repeat this card's effect until your opponent has no cards in their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: giggity giggity

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Name a card.
EFFECT: Search your deck for any number of copies of the card and reveal them. Put 1 into your hand and the rest into your discard pile. Your opponent may search your deck for any number of copies of the card. If they do, put them into your discard pile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: complex magical process

property.name: Card Text
property.value: COUNTERFEIT COST: Use this only if a tactic has been played this turn. Pay 2+X, where X is the numeric cost of the last tactic played this turn. Deplete this card. EFFECT: Duplicate the tactic.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Kenfoo

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a non-resource card.
EFFECT: Put the card into its owner's hand. Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card in it. Your opponent discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i almost never do that

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COVERT
If this card attacks, you may pick a character. If you do, put it into its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Steve Bentley Steve Bentley hates children.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COVERT
This card gains 1 strength and 1 life for each face-down resource your opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Kenfoo Kenfoo likes drawing the hairy man-butts. Just be glad he didn't use his design for the front. There are some things you can't un-see.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COVERT
If this card inflicts damage to a faction, your opponent discards 2 cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: it's watching you

The attached character cannot attack or block.

When this card enters play, look at up to the top 5 cards of either deck. Put them back in any order.

property.value: squishing is the last thing you�ll hear Ms. Clotidia Dowdy, the first female explorer to successfully mount an expedition to the ephemeral North Ridge of Mt. Mulrich, seen here outside Blortingshire Manor a mere four hours before her tragic demise.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: Put the character into its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: a convenient and cowardly solution When the shattering glass shatters, shatters, the cords are drawn slow, again again again, draw the cords, shatter the glass, draw the cords, shatter the glass, wait, silence, with care. Again�

And they�ll swarm all over you and fly in your face and plug up your nose and bite you in the...what do you mean �gnats don�t have stingers�...?� � Millicent Holcroft to General J.G. Blargington III.

You may remove any number of tokens from cards you control. Use the tokens to generate the following effects any number of times:
1 TOKEN: Pick a character. Inflict 1 damage to it. 2 TOKENS: Draw a card. 2 TOKENS: Your opponent discards a card. 3 TOKENS: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand.

You do not lose the game because your faction has 0 influence.

If you draw any number of cards, increase the amount by 1.

property.value: he blends right in Sure is lucky there aren�t any goons around. Yep, no goons here. I mean, it would really suck if a goon turned up. That would ruin everything. But, um� yeah. No goons.

property.value: trafficker of metaphysical currency Mortimer made a fortune investing in the gravity IPO. Unfortunately, he lost it all on a rainy day due to a massive overextension in the sunlight market.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
At the start of each player's turn, that player chooses one of the following:
OPTION 1: That player may draw a card and their opponent may play a resource.
OPTION 2: That player may play a resource and their opponent may draw a card.
OPTION 3: Both players may draw up to 2 cards.
OPTION 4: Both players may play up to 2 resources.

COST: Pick a character. X is its strength.
EFFECT: Destroy the character. Your opponent�s faction gains X influence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: dissecting moral code with diamond-like precision Drugging the audience? Three month's salary. Bumping off last year's winner? A small fortune. Buying the judge? A king's ransom. The smile on my little girl's face? Priceless.

property.value: This turn, cards can only be destroyed by costs, and all inflicted damage is reduced to 0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: in the finest print money can buy �"Alright, already. There's one for each arm, one for the head and one for the leg. But if you want a new shoehorn you'll have to buy it yourself. What do I look like? The charity department?�

property.name: Flavor
property.value: gradual enhancer of voidal currency �You see, feedback is the key to our wealth. The vaults are a tremendous expenditure, true, but the interest they generate simply by storing the voidal humour in its materialized state will eventually pay for the investment many times over. Never have the rich gotten richer with less effort.�

If this card is destroyed, destroy all other "node" cards.

property.value:
At the start of your turn, put a token on the character with the highest strength. If there is a tie, you decide which character gets the token.
All characters gain 1 strength for each token on them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: it's disturbingly comfortable �Well at least our job is better than the guys who have to clean up.�

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: This turn, the character gains 5 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: what did you think the catheter was for?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card gains 1 strength and 1 life for each "dragon" card you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: commanding from above A dragon and his rider are peers. The rider rides at the will of the dragon. They are the captains of the field, circling the battle, landing only to deliver punishment where needed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may pick a character your opponent controls. If you do, destroy it. Otherwise, destroy this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: delivers the biggest beatings ever Pulled into battle by mighty basks, the dragon tank is feared above all else. Even if its victims can disable the enormous machinery, the basks remain to spew their acidic venom in an annihilating torrent of pain.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This turn, your characters gain 5 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: inspirational and inflammatory Crush your enemies. See them driven before you. Hear the lamentations of the women.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may pick a character. If you do, this card inflicts X+1 damage to it, where X is the number of "dragon" cards you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: dragonomically designed �Excuse me?�Is this barracks handicap acce�Oh no! ARGH! NO! <blumph> <mumph> crunch, crunch, crunch, crunch, munch�gulp�<BURP>� �

property.value: Your opponent�s faction loses 2 influence. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: brilliant and perverse �When the fathers see their disemboweled children, they�ll lose heart and that is the time to strike.�

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a blocking character.
EFFECT: Inflict 3 damage to the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: less talking, more screaming �"Ach! My eyes! The goggles, they do nothing!�

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: You may pick 2 or fewer characters.
When this card enters play, if you picked characters as part of its cost, inflict up to 2 damage divided however you want to those characters.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: harbinger of sticky, burning doom �In a state of supreme agitation, the mighty barduse vomits a sticky, viscous mess which bursts into a white-hot flame, consuming everything it touches.�

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may pick a character. If you do, deplete it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: oh boy, not the toupee story again� ��and that one over there is from the trip to Gidea with the wife and kids� and the little one with the three nipples and the toupee, funny story about that��

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Flip a coin. If you win, X is 2. Otherwise, X is 1. Pick X or fewer items.
EFFECT: Destroy the items.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: if your head gets in the way, too bad

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card inflicts damage to a faction, you may pick an item. If you do, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: destroyer of ancestry and culture �Quit your blubbering old man! You *and* your stuff are going to a better place!�

property.name: Card Text
property.value: SHARPSHOOT COST: Pay 1. Deplete this card. Pick a character. EFFECT: Inflict 1 damage to the character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If a card is depleted, that card�s controller�s faction loses 1 influence. (Resources don�t deplete when used; they attach to your faction.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: stop smiling, it hurts! Some torturers disguise their identities. They save the cutest costumes for their cruelest atrocities.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
ATTACH to Character
The attached character gains 2 strength.
HANDOFF COST: Pay 3. Deplete a character you control that is not in a battle. EFFECT: Attach this card to the character.

property.value: i think you got him

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card is blocked, inflict 1 damage to each member of the blocking party.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Zi Jian Zi Jian had a third testicle. He cut it off and threw it into the ocean. It�s now commonly known as the continent of Australia.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: the battle is *next* Tuesday Early to rise, early to die.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: killing at his own pace Large and uncoordinated, the Brutes travel just behind the main army to ensure that survivors won�t be overlooked.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card enters play, inflict 1 damage to all your opponent's characters.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: bookish and brutal �Let�s see�sarcophyle, sardines� ah, here it is. Sarume� aaaaaauuuugh!�

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While this card is attacking, you may assign its battle damage to the target of the attack instead of the blocking party.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: bloated reptile on a vomitous rampage Basks are theorized to be nothing more than a tiny brain atop a mountain of bile. None have survived to validate this claim.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of your turn, if this card started the turn under your control and did not attack this turn, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: fearless and foolish �I don�t care if it�s one at a time or all together�I�m going to make ALL OF YOU my bitch.�

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All your characters gain 1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: echoing the anthems of tyranny Its chilling sound slices the morning air like a razor-sharp sword. The eerie melody foreshadows the dawn of a dark age.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Rudolphus
PUNCH COST: Pay 2. Deplete this card. Pick a character. X is its strength. Y is this card�s strength. EFFECT: Inflict X damage to this card. Inflict Y damage to the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: frightful adonis of infamous temperament

property.name: Flavor
property.value: omen of the coming horde Only the most disagreeable warriors are chosen to be scouts. They comb the countryside in disguise, searching for riches, women, and easily killed men. A town can only pray that it has less of these things than its neighbors.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Inflict 2 damage to all characters.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: they�ll creatively assist you in dying �I ascended the peak towards Avery�s Hern. The shear nervy demeanor of the raven shyer filled my soul with a rasher envy. But alas, the sound of the haver syren from Neva Sherry foretold the dangers of these hills�a cancer these shrievers be!� � Henry Raves, nailer of The Style

property.name: Card Text
property.value: BATTERING RAM COST: Pay 2. Destroy a resource you control. EFFECT: Your opponent's faction loses 1 influence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: intimidating weapon of penetration �I will not sacrifice this city. We�ve made too many compromises already; too many retreats. They invade our fields, and we fall back. They eradicate entire towns, and we fall back. Not again. The line must be drawn *HERE*! This far, *NO FURTHER*! And I will make them pay for what they�ve done.�

property.value: While your opponent controls a character, this card gains 1 strength and 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: he didn�t like being human anyway Failure to do one�s duty often results in �volunteering� for the latest dragon juice experiments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: rejecting the moral decay of his brethren �It was early winter when I went forth from my home base. After many months I found a cave containing tropical coconuts. Using these I fashioned a crude hovel and lived in it for several days. Soon I befriended a pack of bears and we traveled east, towards Macaroon. There I took up small odd jobs under the name of Mister Pilkington. But perhaps I�ve said too much��

EFFECT: This turn, all members of the attacking party gain X strength and X life.

Your opponent cannot respond to this card.
If you played this card in response to a tactic, terminate the tactic. This turn, tactics cannot be played.

property.value: drunken pastime of the cruel �I like to nail �em right after they take the first bite. Whammo! Right between the eyes, granny!�

property.name: Flavor
property.value: just a morning workout The most talented fighters are encouraged from a young age. They�re given all the food they can eat, all the women they can handle, and all the men they can kill.
